2021 Scottish Elections

My Journey to Alliance For Unity

July 29, 2020
Did you hear the one about the lifelong Rangers fan who spoke to George Galloway and decided to work with him to help redefine the Scottish political landscape? It’s not a joke, it’s exactly what happened to me two weeks ago. Until this time, I had never interacted with George Galloway and had never felt any wish to do so. From nowhere, a series of tweets appeared from the former MP, urging pro-UK political parties to form an alliance to defeat the SNP.

We are THE MAJORITY!

Our aim is to give a voice to Scotland's silent majority, to expose Nationalist ideology for what it is: ugly, bigoted and misinformed, and to help you fight back with better tools and psychology.
